## Principal Components
```{r}
dimnames(USArrests)
apply(USArrests, 2, mean)
apply(USArrests, 2, var)
```


Standardize the variables
```{r}
pca.out = prcomp(USArrests, scale = T)
pca.out
names(pca.out)
biplot(pca.out, cex = .5, scale = 0)
```
